Description: <sha>Shadow resistance</sha> <y>-1% per charge</y>.<br3>Upon reaching <w>25 charges</w>, it explodes: Remove all charges, then suffer <sha>2 Shadow damage per charge</sha>.
DescriptionExtended: <sha>Shadow resistance</sha> <y>-1% per charge</y>.<br3>Upon reaching <w>25 charges</w>, it explodes: Remove all charges, then suffer <sha>2 Shadow damage per charge</sha>.<br3>This damage <w>can be blocked</w> and is not affected by other modifiers.<br3>Remove 1 charge at the <w>end of the turn</w>.
